Uses of Class
com.thalmic.myo.Quaternion

    • Uses of Quaternion in com.thalmic.myo

      Methods in com.thalmic.myo that return Quaternion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Quaternion Quaternion.clone()
      Clones this quaternion.
      Quaternion Quaternion.conjugate()
      Return this quaternion's conjugate.
      Quaternion Quaternion.equal(Quaternion other)
      Set the components of this quaternion to be those of the other.

      This method is provided as a Java counterpart of the overloaded C++ "=" operator.
      static Quaternion Quaternion.fromAxisAngle(Vector3 axis, double angle)
      Return a quaternion that represents a right-handed rotation of angle radians about the given axis.
      Quaternion Quaternion.multiply(Quaternion rhs)
      Return the quaternion multiplied by rhs.
      Quaternion Quaternion.multiplyEquals(Quaternion rhs)
      Multiply this quaternion by rhs.

      Return this quaternion updated with the result.

      This method is provided as a Java counterpart of the overloaded C++ "*=" operator.
      Quaternion Quaternion.normalized()
      Return the unit quaternion corresponding to the same rotation as this one.
      static Quaternion Quaternion.rotate(Vector3 from, Vector3 to)
      Return a quaternion that represents a rotation from vector from to to.

      See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1171849/finding-quaternion-representing-the-rotation-from-one-vector-to-another for some explanation.
      Methods in com.thalmic.myo with parameters of type Quaternion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Quaternion Quaternion.equal(Quaternion other)
      Set the components of this quaternion to be those of the other.

      This method is provided as a Java counterpart of the overloaded C++ "=" operator.
      Quaternion Quaternion.multiply(Quaternion rhs)
      Return the quaternion multiplied by rhs.
      Quaternion Quaternion.multiplyEquals(Quaternion rhs)
      Multiply this quaternion by rhs.

      Return this quaternion updated with the result.

      This method is provided as a Java counterpart of the overloaded C++ "*=" operator.
      void DeviceListener.onOrientationData(Myo myo, long timestamp, Quaternion rotation)
      Called when a paired Myo has provided new orientation data.
      static Vector3 Quaternion.rotate(Quaternion quat, Vector3 vec)
      Return a copy of this vec rotated by quat.
      Constructors in com.thalmic.myo with parameters of type Quaternion 
      Constructor and Description
      Quaternion(Quaternion other)
      Creates a quaternion with the components equal to another quaterion.
